title: How do I forward a message or send a mass message?
answer:
**Forwarding messages:****** 


 Open a conversation thread with a contact, touch and hold a message you want to forward and choose **Forward**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45305) 


 **Sending mass messages:** 

 Create a message and click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45310)Â . Select multiple contacts and touch **SELECT**. The message is sent to all selected contacts.
